name: The Hall of Available Samples
description:
Welcome to...

The Hall of Available Samples

The Hall of Available Samples is a museum of free 3D assets. Showcasing the work of dozens of creators from all across the Internet, the hall is based on the Hall of African Mammals in New York's American Museum of Natural History, expect now there's a lot more pizza.

The hall was originally created for a level design final at NYU, taught by the one-and-only Robert Yang. Not only that, but it was a team effort! My co-architect here was Michael Dellapi, whose incredible levity and sense of humor throughout the construction of the hall was what got us through the dark times when everything being broken and generally horrible.

If you have models you're especially proud of let me know and I'll be happy to add an exhibit just for you!
